name: The Revenge of Dracula
description:
The Revenge of Dracula
It's Dracula and his minions versus Van Helsing and the Hunters in this horror twist on a strategy game classic.

Based on the the Dou Shou Qi (Stratego) game rules, The Revenge of Dracula is a turn based strategy game that lets you command either the forces of Van Helsing the Vampire Hunter or Count Dracula in a pitched battle set in a desolate cemetery outside of Victorian era London.
